Text:
Thanks for another fine upload! Nice to not have to make hundreds or even thousands waste time un-raring 

files when the seeder (Un-named groups) could save us all a lot of time. Many thanks to all the uploaders 

who no longer use RAR files.   If this group can do it why can't the rest?  Once again thanks!

Thanks for the great upload!!
Is there a de-facto site for downloading subtitles? i use tvsubtitles.net, but it does not always have DIMENSION subs.
